creator: scott@xigole.com
text:
If I have a build file that calls a build file that calls a build file and I try
to use inheritRef from the first through the second to the third the third build
file does not see the references.

creator: scott@xigole.com
text:
Created attachment 14281
Test case to demonstrate the problem

Extract this file to create a directory named "antbug".  From within antbug
just run ant with no target specified.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
You have a typo in the level2 build script:
It should read:

<project name="level2" default="main" basedir=".">
  <target name="main">
    <javac srcdir="." destdir=".">
      <classpath refid="toplevel.classpath"/>
    </javac>
  </target>
</project>

and not:
<project name="level2" default="main" basedir=".">
  <target name="main">
    <javac srcdir="." destdir=".">
      <classpath>
        <fileset refid="toplevel-classpath"/>
      </classpath>
    </javac>
  </target>
</project>
